About the Company: Eastern Silk Inds Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing of silk yarn, fabrics, home furnishings, fashion fabrics, handloom fabrics, double width fabrics, scarves, laces, belts and embroidered fabrics.The companys research facility has developed technology for fast colour printing on fabrics. Their products are exported to Japan, Canada, US and UK .The company plans to undertake various initiatives in order to increase their business such as develop products with innovative designs and patterns; upgrading machineries and focusing on R&D activities for adding value to their product range.In order to cater to the high-end users of silk products, the Company is embarking on an expansion plan for producing silk velvets including jacquard velvets and this change in the product mix is likely to place the Company`s products in a different league.
